00069 #ifndef RU_MANAGER_H
00070 #define RU_MANAGER_H
00071 
00072 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00073 #include <config.h>
00074 #include <stdio.h>
00075 #include <malloc.h>
00076 #include <stdarg.h>
00077 #include <Lcode/l_code.h>
00078 #include <machine/lmdes.h>
00079 
00080 #define RU_MAP_DEFAULT_SIZE             128
00081 
00082 #define RU_MODE_ACYCLIC                 0
00083 #define RU_MODE_CYCLIC                  1
00084 
00085 /*=========================================================================*/
00086 /*
00087  *      Data structures
00088  */
00089 /*=========================================================================*/
00090 
00091 /*
00092  *      Memory allocation structures
00093  */
00094 
00095 typedef struct _RU_Alloc_Header
00096 {
00097         struct _RU_Alloc_Header   *next;
00098 } RU_Alloc_Header;
00099 
00100 typedef struct _RU_Alloc_Data
00101 {
00102         RU_Alloc_Header *head;          /* Pointer to head of free list */
00103         int             allocated;      /* Number allocated */
00104         int             free;           /* Number free */
00105 } RU_Alloc_Data;
00106 
00107 /*
00108  *      RU info structure associated with each Lcode op
00109  */
00110 
00111 #define RU_SELECTED_ALT(info)((Mdes_Alt *)(info->selected_alt))
00112 #define RU_SELECTED_ALT_ID(info)((int)(info->selected_alt->id))
00113 
00114 typedef struct _RU_Info
00115 {
00116         struct L_Oper           *op;            /* debugging purpose only */
00117         int             proc_opc;       /* opcode */
00118         int             *pred;          /* indices of predicates used by op */
00119         Mdes_Alt        *selected_alt;  /* alternative selected by RU manager */
00120         int             issue_time;     /* time op is issued at */
00121         int             slot_used;      /* slot op is placed in */
00122 } RU_Info;
00123 
00124 /*
00125  *      RU map structure
00126  */
00127 
00128 typedef struct _RU_Node
00129 {
00130         RU_Info         *info;
00131         Mdes_Rused      *rused;
00132         int             option_num;
00133         struct _RU_Node *prev_node;
00134         struct _RU_Node *next_node;
00135 } RU_Node;
00136 
00137 typedef struct _RU_Map
00138 {
00139         Mdes_Rmask      mask;
00140         RU_Node         *first_node;
00141         RU_Node         *last_node;
00142 } RU_Map;
00143

00272         /* (return = slot scheduled in, -1 if cannot be scheduled) */

00275         /* (RU_Info *ru_info, Mdes_Info *mdes_info, int *operand_ready_times,

00280         /* (RU_Info *ru_info, Mdes_Info *mdes_info, int *operand_ready_times,
00281             int issue_time, int earliest_slot, int latest_slot, int flags) */

00287         /* (return = slot scheduled in, -1 if cannot be scheduled) */
